title: Fadillah: Petra, SPAN to drive implementation of transformative measures for water services sector
summary: The Ministry of Energy Transition and Water Transformation (Petra), in collaboration with The National Water Services Commission (SPAN), is poised to establish and devise the framework for implementing transformative measures in the water services sector over the next decade.
content:
KUALA LUMPUR (April 23): The Ministry of Energy Transition and Water Transformation (Petra), in collaboration with The National Water Services Commission (SPAN), is poised to establish and devise the framework for implementing transformative measures in the water services sector over the next decade.

Its minister Datuk Seri Fadillah Yusof announced that Petra intends to engage stakeholders and partner with the Malaysian Water Association (MWA) to solicit input and feedback from all concerned parties.
